articles.author: Ryan Grim, Prem Thakker
articles.title: Biden's Conspiracy Theory About Gaza Casualty Numbers Unravels Upon Inspection - The Intercept
articles.description: One Palestinian American lost more than 40 relatives in Gaza. We found them on the Ministry of Health list.
articles.content: President Joe Biden, asked last week what his government planned to do to reduce the number of civilian casualties in Gaza, responded by rejecting the idea that the numbers could be trusted. “I have … [+7683 chars]
